column1: Met one of the newest and cutest members of #TeamDavis. @AveryBourne and @ap_degroot brought Marshall dressed to impress to Republican Day at the @ILStateFair. https://t.co/EkD8Xi4DZG
It was my honor to introduce @GeauxScalise at Republican Day at the @ILStateFair today. https://t.co/qbjzYBJlQb

Great news! Bobby was excellent Illinois Congressman who was beaten by Illinois Democrat gerrymandering. My birth state would do well to send him back to Washington and fight for all of us! https://t.co/OtrgEWnzmj
